effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Whenever a creature bleeding this way takes damage from that condition, their speed decreases by 1 (to a minimum of 0) until that condition ends.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: The storm hurler throws three size 1L ice javelins into unoccupied squares within distance. Each javelin has 30 Stamina and fire weakness 5. At the start of the storm hurler's next turn, all javelins not destroyed explode in a shower of icicles. Each enemy and object within 3 squares of an exploding javelin makes an **Agility test**.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: The storm hurler and the target each shift up to 6 squares while staying adjacent to each other. The target can then jump up to 5 squares and make a free strike.

items.name: Frozen Retribution
items.trigger: The storm hurler is targeted by a ranged strike.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: The triggering strike has a double bane. If the strike obtains a tier 1 outcome, the storm hurler uses Ice Javelins against the creature who made it.
The storm hurler is surrounded by a snowstorm. Any enemy who starts their turn within 2 squares of the storm hurler can't shift.
